title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 61.8 - License as a dental hygienist by endorsement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 61.8 - License as a dental hygienist by endorsement

State Regulations

For endorsement of a license as a dental hygienist issued
by another jurisdiction of the United States, the applicant shall submit
satisfactory evidence of: (a) having
met all requirements of section
59.6
of this Subchapter; and
(b) lawful and reputable
practice as a dental hygienist of not less than eight months during the two
years next preceding the filing of the application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
61.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
